Text: Why do you have to mount it to burn it?
becouse if you only burn the iso file to a cd without mount it and make a backup cd of it....the computer cant be booted with it
no dumbass, i was askin why can't you just burn the iso, why do you have to mount with DT first?
dont know if u have to...but its the way i do when i burn iso to cd and it works fine
Did'nt work for me...Burned the iso as image using Nero.nothing happend when I booted from the cd.
